data.name: Cloudsea
data.detailed_description:
The world has changed since the invention of airships thirty years ago. The steam-powered airships now fill the sky. Floating islands that were just a speck in the sky are now in reach. Find your way home from the unpredictable sea of clouds and the dangers it holds.

Explore the World of Cloudsea
Explore the world of Cloudsea in the primitive steampunk-ish airships by navigating through an ever-changing sea of clouds and floating islands.



Gather resources and trade
Gather, mine, and trade resources to earn money to buy equipment and airships.

Fight with cannons, swords and rifles
Fight against pirates, bandits and other enemies in airship-to-airship combat or melee and ranged combat on foot.



Manage crew
Find and recruit a crew to be able to fly bigger airships. Keep your airship in shape by delegating the tasks to the crew or by doing them yourself.

Key Features:
  • Explore the open-world in primitive steampunk airships and on foot
  • Trade, gather and mine resources and solve quests
  • Manage the airship and your crew
  • Fight in airship-to-airship battles and melee and ranged combat
  • Play Solo or Split-Screen Co-Op

data.short_description: Cloudsea is a low-poly exploration game set in the clouds of the world of Cloudsea. Explore the floating islands of Cloudsea in airships, manage crew, gather resources, solve quests, trade, and fight in airship-to-airship and melee combat!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 1070, AMD RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
